00041 #define CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_IN GetWinConsoleInTraceClass()
00043 static const TraceClass& GetWinConsoleInTraceClass(void)
00044 {
00045     static const TraceClass cli_WinConsoleInTraceClass("CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_IN", Help()
00046         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "CLI Windows console input traces")
00047         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Traces d'entrées de la console Windows du CLI"));
00048     return cli_WinConsoleInTraceClass;
00049 }
00051 #define CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_OUT GetWinConsoleOutTraceClass()
00053 static const TraceClass& GetWinConsoleOutTraceClass(void)
00054 {
00055     static const TraceClass cli_WinConsoleOutTraceClass("CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_OUT", Help()
00056         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "CLI Windows console output traces")
00057         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Traces de sorties la console Windows du CLI"));
00058     return cli_WinConsoleOutTraceClass;
00059 }

00063 Console::Console(const bool B_AutoDelete)
00064   : IODevice("win-console", B_AutoDelete),
00065     m_pData(NULL)
00066 {
00067     // Does nothing but registers the appropriate trace classes.
00068     GetTraces().Trace(CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_IN);
00069     GetTraces().Trace(CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_OUT);
00070 }

00087 const KEY Console::GetKey(void) const
00088 {
00089     while (1)
00090     {
00091         const int i_Char = getch();
00092         GetTraces().Trace(CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_IN) << "i_Char = " << i_Char << endl;
00093         switch (i_Char)
00094         {
00095             case 0: // Escaped characters
00096             {
00097                 const int i_Char2 = getch();
00098                 GetTraces().Trace(CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_IN) << "i_Char2 = " << i_Char2 << endl;
00099                 switch (i_Char2)
00100                 {
00101                 case 17:    return UNDO;        // CTRL+ALT+Z
00102                 case 21:    return REDO;        // CTRL+ALT+Y
00103                 case 45:    return CUT;         // CTRL+ALT+X
00104                 case 46:    return COPY;        // CTRL+ALT+C
00105                 case 47:    return PASTE;       // CTRL+ALT+V
00106                 case 59:    return F1;
00107                 case 60:    return F2;
00108                 case 61:    return F3;
00109                 case 62:    return F4;
00110                 case 63:    return F5;
00111                 case 64:    return F6;
00112                 case 65:    return F7;
00113                 case 66:    return F8;
00114                 case 67:    return F9;
00115                 case 68:    return F10;
00116                 case 121:   return TILDE;
00117                 case 126:   return BACK_QUOTE;
00118                 case 155:   return PREVIOUS;    // ALT+LEFT
00119                 case 157:   return NEXT;        // ALT+RIGHT
00120                 }
00121                 break;
00122             }
00123             case 1:     return KEY_BEGIN;   // CTRL+A
00124             case 3:     return BREAK;       // CTRL+C
00125             case 4:     return LOGOUT;      // CTRL+D
00126             case 5:     return KEY_END;     // CTRL+E
00127             case 8:     return BACKSPACE;   // (CTRL+H)
00128             case 12:    return CLS;         // CTRL+L
00129             case 14:    return NEXT;        // CTRL+N
00130             case 16:    return PREVIOUS;    // CTRL+P
00131             case 25:    return REDO;        // CTRL+Y
00132             case 26:    return UNDO;        // CTRL+Z
00133             case 27:    return ESCAPE;
00134             //case 63:    return EURO;        // CTRL+ALT+E, conflicts with '?'
00135             case 96:    break;              // character always returned after `
00136             case 126:   break;              // character always return after ~
00137             case 160:   return KEY_aacute;
00138             case 133:   return KEY_agrave;
00139             case 132:   return KEY_auml;
00140             case 131:   return KEY_acirc;
00141             case 135:   return KEY_ccedil;
00142             case 130:   return KEY_eacute;
00143             case 138:   return KEY_egrave;
00144             case 137:   return KEY_euml;
00145             case 136:   return KEY_ecirc;
00146             case 161:   return KEY_iacute;
00147             case 141:   return KEY_igrave;
00148             case 139:   return KEY_iuml;
00149             case 140:   return KEY_icirc;
00150             case 156:   return POUND;
00151             case 162:   return KEY_oacute;
00152             case 149:   return KEY_ograve;
00153             case 148:   return KEY_ouml;
00154             case 147:   return KEY_ocirc;
00155             case 163:   return KEY_uacute;
00156             case 151:   return KEY_ugrave;
00157             case 129:   return KEY_uuml;
00158             case 150:   return KEY_ucirc;
00159             case 224: // Escaped characters.
00160             {
00161                 const int i_Char2 = getch();
00162                 GetTraces().Trace(CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_IN) << "i_Char2 = " << i_Char2 << endl;
00163                 switch (i_Char2)
00164                 {
00165                     case 71:    return KEY_BEGIN;
00166                     case 72:    return KEY_UP;
00167                     case 73:    return PAGE_UP;
00168                     case 75:    return KEY_LEFT;
00169                     case 77:    return KEY_RIGHT;
00170                     case 79:    return KEY_END;
00171                     case 80:    return KEY_DOWN;
00172                     case 81:    return PAGE_DOWN;
00173                     case 82:    return INSERT;
00174                     case 83:    return DELETE;
00175                     case 115:   return PAGE_LEFT;   // CTRL+LEFT
00176                     case 116:   return PAGE_RIGHT;  // CTRL+RIGHT
00177                     case 133:   return F11;
00178                     case 134:   return F12;
00179                     case 141:   return PAGE_UP;     // CTRL+UP
00180                     case 145:   return PAGE_DOWN;   // CTRL+DOWN
00181                     case 146:   return COPY;        // CTRL+INS
00182                 }
00183                 break;
00184             }
00185             case 230:   return MICRO;
00186             case 245:   return PARAGRAPH;
00187             case 248:   return DEGREE;
00188             case 184:   return COPYRIGHT;
00189             case 253:   return SQUARE;
00190             default:
00191             {
00192                 const KEY e_Char = IODevice::GetKey(i_Char);
00193                 if (e_Char != NULL_KEY)
00194                 {
00195                     return e_Char;
00196                 }
00197             }
00198         }
00199     }
00200 }
00201 
00202 void Console::PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const
00203 {
00204     if (STR_Out != NULL)
00205     {
00206         const unsigned int ui_Len = (unsigned int) strlen(STR_Out);
00207         for (unsigned int ui=0; ui<ui_Len; ui++)
00208         {
00209             char str_Char[2] = { STR_Out[ui], '\0' };
00210             switch (str_Char[0])
00211             {
00212                 case KEY_aacute:    str_Char[0] = (char) -96;   break;
00213                 case KEY_agrave:    str_Char[0] = (char) -123;  break;
00214                 case KEY_auml:      str_Char[0] = (char) -124;  break;
00215                 case KEY_acirc:     str_Char[0] = (char) -125;  break;
00216                 case KEY_ccedil:    str_Char[0] = (char) -121;  break;
00217                 case KEY_eacute:    str_Char[0] = (char) -126;  break;
00218                 case KEY_egrave:    str_Char[0] = (char) -118;  break;
00219                 case KEY_euml:      str_Char[0] = (char) -119;  break;
00220                 case KEY_ecirc:     str_Char[0] = (char) -120;  break;
00221                 case KEY_iacute:    str_Char[0] = (char) -95;   break;
00222                 case KEY_igrave:    str_Char[0] = (char) -115;  break;
00223                 case KEY_iuml:      str_Char[0] = (char) -117;  break;
00224                 case KEY_icirc:     str_Char[0] = (char) -116;  break;
00225                 case KEY_oacute:    str_Char[0] = (char) -94;   break;
00226                 case KEY_ograve:    str_Char[0] = (char) -107;  break;
00227                 case KEY_ouml:      str_Char[0] = (char) -108;  break;
00228                 case KEY_ocirc:     str_Char[0] = (char) -109;  break;
00229                 case KEY_uacute:    str_Char[0] = (char) -93;   break;
00230                 case KEY_ugrave:    str_Char[0] = (char) -105;  break;
00231                 case KEY_uuml:      str_Char[0] = (char) -127;  break;
00232                 case KEY_ucirc:     str_Char[0] = (char) -106;  break;
00233                 case SQUARE:        str_Char[0] = (char) -3;    break;
00234                 case EURO:          str_Char[0] = (char) -79;   break;
00235                 case POUND:         str_Char[0] = (char) -100;  break;
00236                 case MICRO:         str_Char[0] = (char) -26;   break;
00237                 case PARAGRAPH:     str_Char[0] = (char) -11;   break;
00238                 case DEGREE:        str_Char[0] = (char) -8;    break;
00239                 case COPYRIGHT:     str_Char[0] = (char) -72;   break;
00240                 case -61:
00241                 {
00242                     // Ecaped characters (from Java for instance).
00243                     if (++ui<ui_Len)
00244                     {
00245                         switch (STR_Out[ui])
00246                         {
00247                             case -95:   str_Char[0] = (char) -96;   break;  // KEY_aacute
00248                             case -96:   str_Char[0] = (char) -123;  break;  // KEY_agrave
00249                             case -92:   str_Char[0] = (char) -124;  break;  // KEY_auml
00250                             case -94:   str_Char[0] = (char) -125;  break;  // KEY_acirc
00251                             case -89:   str_Char[0] = (char) -121;  break;  // KEY_ccedil
00252                             case -87:   str_Char[0] = (char) -126;  break;  // KEY_eacute
00253                             case -88:   str_Char[0] = (char) -118;  break;  // KEY_egrave
00254                             case -85:   str_Char[0] = (char) -119;  break;  // KEY_euml
00255                             case -86:   str_Char[0] = (char) -120;  break;  // KEY_ecirc
00256                             case -83:   str_Char[0] = (char) -95;   break;  // KEY_iacute
00257                             case -84:   str_Char[0] = (char) -115;  break;  // KEY_igrave
00258                             case -81:   str_Char[0] = (char) -117;  break;  // KEY_iuml
00259                             case -82:   str_Char[0] = (char) -116;  break;  // KEY_icirc
00260                             case -77:   str_Char[0] = (char) -94;   break;  // KEY_oacute
00261                             case -78:   str_Char[0] = (char) -107;  break;  // KEY_ograve
00262                             case -74:   str_Char[0] = (char) -108;  break;  // KEY_ouml
00263                             case -76:   str_Char[0] = (char) -109;  break;  // KEY_ocirc
00264                             case -70:   str_Char[0] = (char) -93;   break;  // KEY_uacute
00265                             case -71:   str_Char[0] = (char) -105;  break;  // KEY_ugrave
00266                             case -68:   str_Char[0] = (char) -127;  break;  // KEY_uuml
00267                             case -69:   str_Char[0] = (char) -106;  break;  // KEY_ucirc
00268                         }
00269                     }
00270                     break;
00271                 }
00272             }
00273 
00274             _cputs(str_Char);
00275 
00276             // Additional trace.
00277             if (GetTraces().IsTraceOn(CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_OUT))
00278             {
00279                 if (& GetTraces().GetStream().GetActualDevice() == this)
00280                 {
00281                     GetTraces().SetStream(GetStdErr());
00282                     GetTraces().Trace(CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_OUT) << "Trace stream changed to stderr" << endl;
00283                 }
00284 
00285                 GetTraces().Trace(CLI_WIN_CONSOLE_OUT) << "(" << (int) STR_Out[ui] << ")";
00286             }
00287         }
00288     }
00289 }
